topComments.author: Zahid Hussain Bootwala
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Realmente um lugar agrad√°vel para passar o dia, as crian√ßas realmente gostaram do lugar e dos escorregadores ... h√° algo para todos ... meu favorito rio pregui√ßoso üòÄ, amplo espa√ßo para sentar ... a √∫nica desvantagem √© que eles n√£o permitem a reentrada, por favor, certifique-se de carregue tudo que voc√™ vai precisar  (Original) Really a nice place to spend the day, kids really enjoyed the place and slides‚Ä¶there is something for everyone..my fav lazy river üòÄ, ample seating space ‚Ä¶only drawback is they don‚Äôt allow re-entry so pls be sure to carry everything you will need

topComments.author: Sabris S.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s amamos isso. Tem muitas salvaguardas em todas as piscinas. H√° uma lista de itens proibidos na porta (sem comida e sem carros aleg√≥ricos, a menos que aprovado pela guarda costeira). Eles t√™m coletes salva-vidas dispon√≠veis sem custo adicional. √â acess√≠vel para entrar. Eu levei 3 crian√ßas: 2, 5 e 11 e todos eles tiveram um grande momento.  (Original) We love it. It has a lot of safeguards in all of the pools. There is a list of prohibited items at the door (no food and no floats unless approved by the coastguard). They have life vests available at no extra cost. It is affordable to get in. I took 3 kids: 2, 5 and 11 and all of them had a great time.

topComments.author: Fabio Cabrera
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Excelente ambiente, a equipe √© atenciosa. A comida tem um bom pre√ßo na cantina. Muito estacionamento, mas voc√™ deve chegar na abertura para estacionar mais perto da entrada e menos multid√µes.  (Original) Great atmosphere, staff is attentive. Food is well priced at the cantina. Lots of parking, but you should arrive at opening for closer parking by entrance and less crowds.

topComments.author: Kay R.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pela primeira vez visitando este parque aqu√°tico, foi √≥timo na maior parte. Meu 4 anos de idade adorou. H√° um lado com slides para as crian√ßas menores e um lado para os maiores. Piscina e rio lento para todos. A √∫nica coisa que n√£o gostei foi a comida. N√£o s√≥ era caro, mas nem mesmo era bom. Cachorro de salsicha me deixou doente. $ 5 para uma fatia de pizza do almo√ßo escolar. E eles n√£o permitem qualquer comida de fora, nem mesmo garrafas de √°gua. Eu sugiro que cheguem cedo porque no final do dia fica muito lotado.  (Original) First time visiting this water park, it was great for the most part. My 4 yr old loved it. There‚Äôs a side with slides for the smaller kids and a side for the bigger kids. Pool and lazy river for everyone. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was the food. Not only was it over priced but it wasn‚Äôt even good. Sausage dog made me sick. $5 for school lunch slice of pizza. And they don‚Äôt allow any outside food not even water bottles. I suggest an early arrival  because later in the day it gets very packed.

topComments.author: Erika Menera
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â muito bom porque os meus filhos foram ao escorrega e disseram que gosto muito deste parque  (Original) Its really good because my children went to the slide and said i really like this park

topComments.author: Claudia Iscoa
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) OK, vamos come√ßar com o n√∫mero um: O pre√ßo √© administr√°vel - as pessoas que v√£o l√° s√£o um pouco question√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãse voc√™ n√£o est√° acostumado com carne de porco com feij√£o ou com gente da cidade. As piscinas de √°gua s√£o principalmente para crian√ßas mais novas  N√∫mero dois, a comida: J√° ouvi outras pessoas dizerem que a comida √© cara, sim √© e a quantidade √© muito pequena, mas tem um gosto bom e se voc√™ estiver com muita fome, sugiro que coma antes de ir ou depois de sair, apenas o que voc√™ deve comprar √© algo para bebida  N√∫mero tr√™s: Os salva-vidas eles s√£o muito jovens, alguns deles t√™m modos, alguns deles s√£o realmente rudes Eu gostaria que os pais os tivessem ensinado boas maneiras e eu realmente sinto que eles simplesmente n√£o querem se levantar de manh√£ para ir trabalhar e mesmo se houver um cliente dif√≠cil, eles precisam saber que para cada a√ß√£o h√° uma rea√ß√£o  (Original) OK let‚Äôs start with number one : The price is manageable the people that go there are a little questionable if you‚Äôre not used to Pork and beans or over town folks. The water pools are mostly for younger children  Number two the food: I‚Äôve heard others say the food is expensive, yes it is and the quantity is very little but it taste good and if you‚Äôre super hungry I suggest you eat before you go or after you leave only thing you should get is something to drink  Number three: The lifeguards they are very young some of them have manners some of them are really rude I wish the parents had taught them better manners I think they need to hire a certain age because these kids today unfortunately most of them had no home training and I really feel like they just don‚Äôt want to get up in the morning to go to work and even if there is a difficult customer they need to know that for every action there‚Äôs a reaction
